channel.title: Grand thef auto vice city cheats
channel.description:
I started playing Gta on my 360 a couple weeks ago and i went to look up some cheats and there all for the xbox most likely because the game was made for the xbox not the 360. so i tried to convert the cheats and well that didnt turn out so well. Some of the cheats like Spawn Rhino will work and i think it is because it dosent have a up,down,left or right in it. Take a look!
For Example Xbox version-Spawn Rhino= B,B,L,B,B,B,L,White,R,Y,B,Y 360 version-Spawn Rhino= B,B,Lt,B,B,B,Lt,Lb,Rt,Y,B,Y --This works-- Xbox version-Look Like Sonny= B,L,B,White,Left,A,R,L,A,A 360 version-Look Like Sonny= B,L,B,Lb,Left,A,Rt,Lt,A,A --This dosent -- And i made these based off this key [code] _Key_ y=y b=b x=x a=a White=Lb Black=Rb L=Lt R=Rt[/code]
So i am wondering dose anyone know a site that already has these figured out or something that might help me
and just in case you dont get what i am asking i will say it again I want to use cheats on grand theft auto vice city for the xbox on my xbox 360

item.title: Grand thef auto vice city cheats
item.dc:creator: @Jeremy368 Jeremy368
item.description:
@Jeremy368 wrote:

I started playing Gta on my 360 a couple weeks ago and i went to look up some cheats and there all for the xbox most likely because the game was made for the xbox not the 360. so i tried to convert the cheats and well that didnt turn out so well. Some of the cheats like Spawn Rhino will work and i think it is because it dosent have a up,down,left or right in it. Take a look!

For Example
Xbox version-Spawn Rhino= B,B,L,B,B,B,L,White,R,Y,B,Y
360 version-Spawn Rhino= B,B,Lt,B,B,B,Lt,Lb,Rt,Y,B,Y
–This works–
Xbox version-Look Like Sonny= B,L,B,White,Left,A,R,L,A,A
360 version-Look Like Sonny= B,L,B,Lb,Left,A,Rt,Lt,A,A
–This dosent –
And i made these based off this key

_Key_ y=y b=b x=x a=a White=Lb Black=Rb L=Lt R=Rt

So i am wondering dose anyone know a site that already has these figured out or something that might help me

and just in case you dont get what i am asking i will say it again
I want to use cheats on grand theft auto vice city for the xbox on my xbox 360

Read full topic
